dataIdInfo.idAbs: A layer file for U.S. States (Generalized) represents the 50 states and the District of Columbia of the United States.
dataIdInfo.idPurp: This data is intended for use with Getting to Know ArcGIS Desktop. It may have been modified for training purposes and should not be used for analysis outside of this context.

Consts.useLimit: This data is intended for training exercises found in the book Getting to Know ArcGIS for Desktop. It is for educational purposes only. The data should not be used for analysis, surveying, or navigation. Esri Press and its data contributors are not liable for misuse of the data.
